item.title: Rob McCarthy
item.description: A blog about the infosec concepts that I find interesting and/or helpful | M.S. Information Security Policy and Management CMU ‘20 I work and study at Carnegie Mellon University. My focus areas are penetration testing, technical project management, and documentation. I continue to contribute to open source projects, and have done extensive development work in bash, and python. I am a teaching assistant for a course in low-level code vulnerabilities, web application security, and the SDLC, and have authored an intentionally vulnerable web server from which students can learn.
